${ModID}:ColdSeason.NAME: Cold Season
${ModID}:ColdSeason.DESCRIPTION: 每当敌人失去生命 from ${ModID}:Frostbite, apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite。

${ModID}:FrigidBody.NAME: Frigid Body
${ModID}:FrigidBody.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 每当 you are attacked 本回合, apply ${ModID}:Frostbite equal to 格挡ed damage。

${ModID}:Frostburn.NAME: Frostburn
${ModID}:Frostburn.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite to 所有敌人. NL Add a *Burn into your 弃牌堆。

${ModID}:Glaciate.NAME: Glaciate
${ModID}:Glaciate.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you apply ${ModID}:Frostbite, 获得 !M! 活力。

${ModID}:GrowingAffliction.NAME: Growing Affliction
${ModID}:GrowingAffliction.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 每当 you apply a debuff, return this from the 弃牌堆 to your hand。

${ModID}:IcicleSpear.NAME: Icicle Spear
${ModID}:IcicleSpear.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite。

${ModID}:InsultToInjury.NAME: Insult to Injury
${ModID}:InsultToInjury.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Repeat for each unique debuff the enemy has。

${ModID}:RelentlessHail.NAME: Relentless Hail
${ModID}:RelentlessHail.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 !M! 次。

${ModID}:Subdue.NAME: Subdue
${ModID}:Subdue.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If the last card played in 本场战斗 was an Attack, 获得 !B! additional 格挡 。
